item.title: 配置 kubeconfig
item.description: 创建配置文件 mkdir -pv ${KFS_CONFIG} cd ${KFS_CONFIG} # 确保 KUBERNETES_PUBLIC_ADDRESS 值是正确的 echo $KUBERNETES_PUBLIC_ADDRESS kubelet 为每个节点的 kubelet 创建独立的配置文件： for instance in k8s-node-1 k8s-node-2; do kubectl config set-cluster kfs \ --certificate-authority=ca.pem \ --embed-certs=true \ --server=https://${KUBERNETES_PUBLIC_ADDRESS}:6443 \ --kubeconfig=${instance}.kubeconfig kubectl config set-credentials system:node:${instance} \ --client-certificate=${instance}.pem \ --client-key=${instance}-key.pem \ --embed-certs=true \ --kubeconfig=${instance}.kubeconfig kubectl config set-context default \ --cluster=kfs \ --user=system:node:${instance} \ --kubeconfig=${instance}.kubeconfig kubectl config use-context default --kubeconfig=${instance}.
